Package net.sf.jameleon.plugin.jagacy.tags

Class Summary
JagacyIsTextPresentTag Checks for text on the current screen and stores the result (true/false) in the provided context variable name.
JagacySendKeyTag Enters a given key.
JagacySendStringTag Sends a series of non-command keys to the screen.
JagacySetFieldTag Sets the provided field to the provided value.
JagacySetValueForFieldAtRowColumnTag Sets the value of a field located at the row column coordinates.
JagacySetValueForLabelTag Sets the value of a field marked by the preceeding text.
JagacyValidateTextNotPresentTag Verifies that the given text doesn't exist on the screen or on the provided row if defined.
JagacyValidateTextPresentTag Verifies that the given text exists on the screen or on the provided row if defined.
JagacyWaitForChangeTag Waits for the screen to change for the time provided or 4 seconds
JagacyWaitForTextTag Waits for the provided text to display on the screen.
